item.title: Making a Static Website
item.description: https://www.staticgen.com/ https://wsvincent.com/static-vs-dynamic-websites-pros-and-cons/ https://dzone.com/articles/6-reasons-why-you-should-go-for-a-static-website https://devopedia.org/package-manager I made this website using the Hugo via the blogdown package in R. Like many R Users, I started using the software to do statistical analysis. I never thought that I’d be making a whole website on it! Choosing a Static Website Generator Even though I have been using RStudio IDE regularly, I didn’t initially resort to the blogdown package but decided to test Jekyll out, which is the generator for pages that use the .
